attributes.action: More financial aid for people under 25 who have been in care or estranged from their family for over 5 years
attributes.additional_details:
For the government to provide more financial aid for young people under 25 who are unemployed or in full time education and have been in care or estranged from their family for 5 years. This category of young people are most vulnerable of becoming homeless due to not having family support that is sometimes needed, if they become unemployed or whilst they are in full time education.
They are scrapping the access to learning fun this year, which has been a helping hand to such students in the past and also some young people 16-18 are unable to receive job seekers allowance.
